Hello Buckley,
time flies and soon we will celebrate a New Year and are looking forward to working on new plans and accomplishing lofty goals.
The New Year is a great time to reflect and look back on what has happened and look forward for what’s to come.
For Rademade it was a year of changes. In 2019 we became, bigger, faster and more powerful. We became a group of companies ITernal Group that offers not only on software development but also M&A, R&D and Real estate. In a nutshell, we are capable to open R&D centres in Ukraine, using our recruitment resources and own schools/universities.
Please read this article for the full story and don’t hesitate to contact us in case of any questions. We are very excited about our new capabilities and what this means for our clients and partners.
Thank you for being with us this year,
we truly appreciate having you in our community. We hope that your life will be filled with happiness, positive achievements and prosperity in the next year. We look forward to continue being your trusted partners in innovation and success.
Please share with us your greatest accomplishments of 2019? What plans do you have for 2020?
